name: Trestle - The New Sudoku
description:
Drag between circles to create a bridge. Each circle needs some amount of bridges to fill. Fill all circles to win.

Trestle is a simple, beautiful game with hours of mind-bending puzzles. Based on Hashiwokakero, a Japanese puzzle similar to Sudoku, Trestle adds a delightful, modern interface and updated rules. If you’re a hardcore Hashi player, you’ll find all the puzzles you need in Traditional mode.

Features:
- Full challenge mode packed with 700+ levels. Beautiful and fun colors and animations mean new levels are never boring.
- Not challenged enough by challenge mode? Play unlimited in Arcade mode.
- Play on the go and at home with progress that syncs across your devices through iCloud.
- Adaptive user interface works great on all iPhones and iPads, including iPhone Xs, Xs Max, and iPad Pro.
- Built in timer to race the same level with your friends in Arcade, or challenge yourself to improve your time.

What people are saying:
- "Really brings the nerd out in me. Few levels in and I'm in love with this game already!"
- "Such a simple concept, but so addicting"
- "I sat down with it last night on my iPad and before I knew it I'd finished half the levels"

Like Trestle or got a bug to report? Our tiny company has a growing community at facebook.com/trestleapp, instagram.com/trestle.app, or twitter.com/trestleapp.

Good luck!
